8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Laila narrated from the one who freed her (Umm Amarah) that:The Prophet said: "When those who are not fasting eat in the presence of the fasting person, the angels send Salat upon him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّائِمِ إِذَا أُكِلَ عِنْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue For The Fasting Person When Others Are Eating In His Presence
